item.title: How Microsoft defends against 7000 password attackers per second
item.description: Vasu Jakkal's reflects how AI is the core DNA of Microsoft security, permeating every product and service the software giant produces.

item.title: AWS debuts advanced RAG features for structured, unstructured data

item.title: AWS now allows prompt caching with 90% cost reduction
item.description: AWS added Intelligent Prompt Routing and Prompt Caching to Bedrock in hopes of getting model usage prices down.

item.title: Amazon HyperPod Task Governance keeps GPUs running, cutting costs 40%
item.description: HyperPod Task Governance can increase GPU utilization, helping enterprises to optimize AI costs and producing potentially significant savings.

item.title: Python data validator Pydantic launches model agnostic, AI agent development platform
item.description: A new agent framework designed to simplify the development of production-grade applications powered by large language models
